comment: This recipe sounds pretty tasty! I had a grapefruit IPA while I was at Port Brewing in Carlsbad last summer that is made with grapefruit and it was one of the best IPAs I had last year.
An IPA made with actual grapefruit! Rather than relying on hops to provide that flavor? Who woulda thunk it? haha. That's sounds pretty great actually! Cheers!
